1.content:
It's the first day of your 3rd year, and it's already going wrong. Through a mix-up in the universities computer system, you got put in Mr. Wexler's Advanced Physics class, and you're not even a science major! So here you are, outside his laboratory door to have him sign your slip allowing you to drop his class, and then hope you can get into that drama class some of your friends are taking for the easy credits. You knock, but there's no answer. You can tell he's in there though by the sound of stuff moving around, and the flashing of the lights. Your cousin Jean had him a few years ago when she went to old BU, and she said he was absentminded as all hell and you should just walk in when you went to see him.

So after a few knocks with no answer, you finally open the door. "Mr. Wexler?" you say trepidatiously, as you slowly walk into his lab. The short bald man looks up and glances at you quickly through his thick spectacles before just as quickly looking back down at his work.

"What do you want? And don't touch anything!" he announces just as quickly. You walk in and go to stand beside him, explaining your situation. "Ok, hold on a minute and I'll sign your slip. I've nearly completed a device that will forever change our world!" You think for a second that he nearly sounds like a maniac, but its probably best not to mention that to him before he signs the slip. Or maybe at all.

You're waiting there for nearly 20 minutes shuffling your feet as he finally finishes his device, which looks like a kind of advanced pistol. You can't imagine what all those dials and switches could be for. He closes a cover on it and picks it up, brandishing it like a gun. He looks and over at a hawk he has on a stand in the corner, aims, and fires at the bird. A dim ray of light shoots out of it and hits the bird, growing it to double its previous size. Your jaw drops, and the bird looks slightly confused, as it jumps off and flies over and lands on a desk. Wexler turns back around and says "There, now I can show all those people that tried to get rid of me that I am important!"

There's no mistaking that he is actually insane at this point. And then he notices you, standing there mouth agape. "Oh dear, I forgot you were there. Now that you have witnessed my invention I can't have you warning anyone about this." He adjusts the device, points it at you, and says "Goodbye!"

You duck just in time between the lab tables, and see a dim ray cut through the air above you. Then just as suddenly another ray goes back the opposite way. Wexler Shouts "Noooooo!" so you peak over the tables edge and see his bald head going below the surface. You look back and surmise that he hit that mirror on the far wall and it reflected to him. You get up and go around the table, and there's Wexler, about 5 inches tall. He sees you and shoots at you again, and you slowly shrink down to 6 inches tall. You run over to the side of the lab table back out of sight of him as he yells that he's going to get you for shrinking him. Peeking around the corner you see him coming in your direction, but there's also his giant bird coming behind him. He doesn't even have time to scream before he's picked up and carried away, conveniently dropping his size gun to the ground as he's carried past you, and ultimately out the window with the bird. You quickly grab the gun and restore your size. You stand there a moment and marvel at your luck, before realizing the potential of the device you have in your hands.

The question is, where do you go from here?

You point the gun at yourself and pull the trigger. Nothing seems to happen. You sit for a few seconds, holding down the trigger while waiting for the gun to hopefully start actually growing you. Within a few more seconds of doubt there is suddenly an extremely loud siren going off what sounds like its a few feet from your head. You drop the gun and attempt to open the car door to find out where the fuck that damn noise is coming from, but the door is stuck. You try to force it open but the door wont extend out more than a few centimeters. You look out the window to see a 3ft tall or so truck outside the door, blocking you in and seeming to be the source of the siren. It hits you that the size gun was indeed working and that you were just growing your car with you.

You recover the size gun and fiddle with it till your sure you've set it to shrink. You roll down your window and simply reach out with gun in hand to shrink down the truck. It works, and soon the truck is a few mere inches tall, still blaring away but at least its a lot lighter now. With your car door now free you hop out and examine the tiny truck now sitting in a parking space meant for a vehicle many times its size. Getting down on all fours for a better look, you look down at the tiny nuisance with and annoyed look. The right side of the thing is banged up from rear to hood, probably from accidentally growing your own car into it. You quickly glance up to your own car, and take a sigh of relieve to discover that it seems to be left unscathed. Returning your focus back to the truck you reach down and casually push it back and forth like it was a toy. The wheels were locked in place, so it was more dragging then anything like a real toy would move, but it hardly offered any resistance to your fun.

After a few moments of play you decide it was time to get going. You stand up, and think about taking the truck with you or perhaps returning it to size, but decide against it. You couldn't put up with its, still lightly blaring siren, and at normal size the damn noise was sure to attract attention. Ultimately you decide to finish off the little toy, you already messed it up pretty well anyway. And with a swift stomp the truck was no more, and you finally were relieved of the moderately annoying beeping. You look back to your, now 15 or so foot car. There's no way the thing would fit in a lane, even on the highway. Maybe you should take it down a notch. On the other hand... Your mind drifts to an image of you, driving along in a 50ft version of your car rolling down the highway making road kill out of other motorist. You chuckle lightly to yourself, you couldn't do that, surely, the destruction the chaos, the military, get real. But then... it would be a pretty damn cool...

You take a moment to marvel that everything you're wearing, from your jeans, t-shirt, and underwear, to your backpack, watch, and everything in between are just over fifteen percent smaller than they were this morning. Everything the same, but in slight miniature. This remote really is something else. Your reflective reverie is shattered when you realize that Jake is on his way over.

The ray refracted in seemingly every direction, the bottle looked something like a disco ball in how light seemed to drench the whole store in the light of the gun's ray. You close your eyes tight in reaction to the blinding light and let off the trigger. It takes a few moments for your vision to recover, one of the beams of light stuck you right in the eye, but when your vision returns nothing seems really different, except...wait. Around you the store was...off actually.

It all looked more or less the same as when you came in but everything seemed just slightly off in scale, like the shelves in front of you seemed a foot taller than it was before, and the shelves behind you looked to be a few inches shorter. And the bottles on the shelves all around you seemed to vary 2 or 3 inches bigger or smaller than they were supposed to be. Whatever, you just shrug it off and continue to shrink down a few more bottles of what you knew was safe to shrink and shove them in your pockets.

After getting your pockets filled with tiny booze you turn away to nonchalantly leave the store. Luckily the guy behind the counter was too busy cleaning off his glasses with a confused look on his face to really notice you making off with your pockets mysteriously stuffed, and you get away unimpeded. Soon you're out of the store, but the outside seems even more off scale then inside store!
113222333.title: big store

it was a dude from inside the store
1132223332.content:
You emerged from the store to see you were massive. Apparently you had unwittingly grown the whole store, and everything in it.. You looked down at the ground to see the store itself seemed to've bulldozed an entire neighborhood under it as it grew. You yourself just stood right in the middle of a small suburban road, your two sneakers blocking off any traffic that might like to pass you, with large cracks in the pavement webbing out around where you stood.

You looked over at a random car sitting parked in someone's garage in front of you. You casually lifted your foot up over it and rolled it around under the sole of your sneaker, just playing with it more than anything else as it bent and twisted under you. After playing with it a bit you lift your foot back and kick the shit out of it, hoping to send it hurdling a few blocks away. You give it an impressive kick, though unfortunately the house in front of you caught it, resulting in it just getting stuck a few rooms deep after blasting into the poor house.

You just laughed it off before lifting your foot back again and give the whole house a swift kick. Most f the shin high house shattered into a thousand pieces, with the car you kicked earlier sent sailing through the air to crash down in yet another house several blocks away, with debris of the house you kicked littering the neighborhood streets and yards everywhere from here to there. You chuckled as you looked over your new tiny toy sized world. You started to walk off down the lazy street when you heard something from behind you “Holy shit!”

They embarrassed you freshman year in an initiation for their sorority acceptance. Using the gun on one or both of them would be such sweet revenge! Also walking with them is Amber's boyfriend, Stan, a member of the Alpha Betas, and one of this year's crops of pledges for the Pi's. Stan's also a complete jerk, and he assisted the ladies in their humiliation of you.

Who deserves to be punished first? Or maybe it would be funner to sneak into a sorority house for some pint sized spying...

A wave of vertigo passes over you as you dwindle down, but soon you're all right. You're now about five inches tall, hidden in the bushes by the Epsilon house, and ready to begin sneaking in. But now what would the best way in?

There's the door up on the porch, but that would involve climbing and waiting for someone to leave or come home. There's also a drainpipe that leads to the gutters, and looking up that it looks like it goes right past an open window. If you can climb it, that's an easy entrance. You also notice a window well that goes down into the basement. You'll have to figure a way to get that window open, but going down is easier than climbing.

Her voice even seems louder

114112112.title: Tina? O_o

1141121122.content:
She was about to cry when she notices the gun but not you. "Hey what's this" she says picking it up. She examines it, plays with it and switches it to Grow but then she accidentally fires it at herself.

Tina's grip on the trigger tightens briefly as she yelps in a mix of shock, surprise, confusion and fear. "Eeek!" Tina is bathed in the light then she stumbles back failing onto her rear end and dropping the gun. Somehow the action makes the trigger stick and the gun is lying on the floor still bathing your "little" sister Tina in light.

Shockingly nothing seems to be happening to the the short 5 year old yet. Thinking fast you run in front of the beam of light.

Moments later you're on the floor next to the gun at normal size and it's firing on Tina again who hadn't recovered fully in the moments you blocked the beam.

Your vision returns and you quickly snap back to the situation at hand. With little time to think your primary concern is stopping the gun. You pick it up with it still aimed at your 5 year old little sister and jiggle the trigger.

Finally the device stops. You breathe a sigh of relief. You turn your back on Tina thankful that for some reason the gun didn't seem to change her.

Meanwhile Tina still sitting on the floor recovers her vision. "Ouchie" she says rubbing her slightly sore behind as best as she can in her sitting position.

Neither of you notice her start to Grow. Tina's spell only lasts about a minute then ends with her twice her normal size. She's too busy rubbing her butt to notice and you're too busy examining the gun.

"Huh why didn't this thing make Tina grow I wonder? Maybe it only shrinks and restores" you muse.

Suddenly Tina feels strange. The growth resumes and she notices this time. "W-what was that thing? And what's happening to me I feel weird" said Tina as the 6 foot 5 year old began growing again.

Bigger her body and her clothes swelled taking up more space in your mostly unfurnished former bedroom.

"Big bro you're here after all" Tina exclaims noticing you as she reaches 7 feet and growing.

"At least she's normal size. Still I wouldn't have minded helping her not be so short" you say then snap out of it hearing Tina call you.

You turn around at last and go wide eyed at the sight and situation before you. Your 8 foot tall and growing "little" sister is sitting in front of you legs open her bare feet and legs inching towards you at a noticeable but slow rate and her sky blue panties peeking out under her skirt.

"Oh crap" you say. Panicking you remember the gun in your hands. Quickly you make a snap decision aim and fire bathing the 8 1/2 foot and growing Tina in light once again though not nearly as blinding to her this time.

You were about to PAT yourself on the back when you realize it's having seemingly no effect then nearly slap yourself realizing it's still on Grow. You quickly stop firing. You're about to switch it to Shrink when the 9 foot Tina reacts.

"Josh stop hurting my eyes with your toy and answer me" she says slapping the gun out your hand and out the open window.

"Wait a minute I-I'm bigger than you now and I'm still getting bigger. That's what the weird feeling was" Tina finally realized amidst the chaos and all that had happened.

"You just realized that" said Josh. "And I wasn't trying to hurt your eyes! You played with that thing first without asking"

"Hey a lot happened today! I got beat up again , blinded twice and hurt my butt" defended the now 11 foot tall Tina.

"Anyway this is so cool if I'm bigger than big brother, that means I'm bigger than all the bullies, and bad people and I'm not little no more! I wonder how big I'll get."

"Tina please as happy as I am for you this isn't a game! We gotta fix this before mom and dad find out or worse before you destroy the house" said Josh.

The 12 foot and still growing 5 year old began to tear up. **sniff** "You're no fun! And there's nuffin to fix I finally get to be big for once. It's a dream come true" she pouted and sobbed. For good measure she threw in her puppy dog pout that no one in your family could resist. Even at 13 feet tall Josh's heart melted and he was putty in her growing hands and he relented.

Oddly you also noticed her bruises and skinned knee seemed to be healing now almost unnoticeable. "Fine we won't fix this yet but still we gotta get you out of the house at least, it's just dumb luck and lucky for you my room was the biggest in the house" says Josh.

Just then as Tina hits 16 feet tall her head smacks the ceiling and the growth stops again. "Ouchie! It doesn't seem so big to me." Tina counters rubbing her now sore head.

"This from Shrimp-Zilla" he mockingly teased. "Besides you sitting on that oversized butt of yours is helpful for more than just giving me a view of your blue panties"

"H-hey" she stuttered and blushed "You no boys aren't sposed to look there and I'm not a shrimp anymore" she huffed.

"Relax I was just teasing and joking a little playfully. Anyway you seem to be done growing for now"

"Aww I guess I am" she said crestfallen.

"Hey you never know you could grow more which is partly why we need to get you out of the house" said Josh trying to cheer her up.

Truth be told though Josh hoped Tina wouldn't grow anymore. Sure he had a deep seated secret giantess fetish but seeing his "little" sister as one was weird, disconcerting and all the more creepy that it was turning him on. He had to remind himself she was family and his little sister to boot even if only in age. Age mattered most on this point.

"I guess you're right big bro but I hope I get maybe just a little bigger."

"Ok now for operation get the oversized munchkin out of the house" said Josh.

"Ok but how" asked Tina

"Well can you crawl?"

"Uh maybe" she said shifting position into a crouch on all fours. As she did so the floor creaked greatly in protest of your sisters New size and presumable weight.

"Ok now try to crawl out the door. Thankfully you've always been skinny" said Josh.

Taking his advise Tina began to crawl forward with mild difficulty, the floors creaking protesting as she did so. She barely made it through the door and into the hallway as her brother followed. "Okay now carefully crawl down the steps" he instructed.

Carefully Tina crawled forward descending the steps to the downstairs very cautiously. A few minutes later and she was in the living room.

"Okay now let's get out the back and see if we can find the "toy" you knocked out my window" said Josh.

"Why? You aren't gonna try and hurt my eyes again are you" asked Tina.

"No of course not" he said, knowing he was lying to a degree what with plans to try and shrink Tina.

Trusting her brother she carefully crawls after him and out the back door.
No sooner than they get out into the backyard Tina starts growing again.

"Hey I'm getting bigger again" said Tina.

"Crap" said Josh under his breathe as she hits 17 Feet and counting.

1141133.content:
If you're going to drive Bessie, you're going to have to use the controller. So why not make her better first?

You spend the next few hours soldering and equipping Bessie for tiny passengers. First there's comfort, so you pad the hard plastic seats with rubber bands, washcloths, and cotton balls. Then there's the open top, so you add a few wires and bars to make it closer to a full racing roll cage.

Finally there's the horn. You disengage it, then make a holster of sorts on the hood. You build a simple motor in the middle of the holster, and affix the horn wire to that. Now when you activate the horn, it pushes a little lever. Putting the Shrink ray in place, you activate the horn again, and now it shoots out a blast, reducing your chair to 3 inches tall.

Taking a step back, you admire your handiwork. Bessie is ready to roll now!

Sara appeared to be almost tearing up. "Sorry I ruined your wedding Tiffany," she said, nearly sobbing. The little girl's mother was still trying to get her attention on the ground to calm her down. The panicking crowd was still trying to exit the church, though having difficulty all trying to squeeze through one exit.

"Just...just put me down," Tiffany whimpered. She was not viewing the girl as her sweet little cousin anymore. She felt she was in the hand of a monster. She longed to be far away from here with her would-be groom.

Sara could see that Tiffany was upset. She felt extremely guilty for causing such havoc and ruining the wedding day. She tried to think of what comforted her when she was sad. She smiled as she looked at the sobbing bride in her hand. "Do you want to talk to your mommy?" the titanic 4-year-old asked, trying to cheer her cousin up. Her massive eyes scanned the crowd, looking for Susan, the mother of the bride. She spotted her with her back against the wall trying to stay out of sight. The woman screamed as Sara tightly wrapped her fingers around her and lifted her up. Thinking she had figured out a way to calm Tiffany down, Sara smiled as she showed Tiff her mother being clenched in her other hand. "Here you go Tiffany. Talk to your mommy."

Susan could not breathe. Her massive niece was holding her so tightly she was beginning to be light-headed. Between Tiffany crying and the people below screaming, Sara did not realize her own strength. Tiffany could see her mother gasping for air and turning purple. "Sara stop!" she screamed. "You're hurting her!" Then it happened. Sara had accidentally gripped the bride's mother, Susan, so tightly that her body just gave out. The woman tried to scream but her body burst like a balloon in Sara's hand. Sara was caught completely off guard by this.

Poor Tiffany however had witnessed the whole thing. Her mother was now nothing more than splattered remains all over her cousins hand. Her own wedding dress was now stained red, as the woman's blood had splattered onto her as well. Her screams of terror had turns to shrill cries of hysteria. She squirmed, trying to fight with everything the had to get away from this behemoth.

Sara was crying as well. She did not fully understand what she had just done to her aunt. She was also getting desperate, feeling like it was her responsibility to try to cheer up Tiffany. Using her 4-year-old mind, Sara decides that maybe she should play a game with the tiny woman. What does she do...
114212111212112.title: Tiffany, the bride

Only food and drink goes in the mouth, Tiffany was certainly neither.

"MOMMY If you can hear me I'm putting Aunt Tiffany down"

She then lowered her into the church.

A hysteric Tiffany rushed off.

"My sisters a monster now. I have to stop her"

she cried but it was no use.

114212111212112213.title: You regain consciousness

1142121112121122132.content:
You decided to try and help Sarah.
Sure she’d just done terrible things.
Sure she was emotional.
Sure you’re little more than a doll to her.
Sure she was technically a murderer and capable of killing you with ease.



The thing is though this was all technically your fault either directly or indirectly.
Her stupid panicked brother didn’t exactly help though.
You picked up the damaged gun and run off past the panicked wedding guests.
They were too busy crying or in fear.
A few of the most sympathetic ones actually mentioned how bad they felt for Sarah.
One girl around twice Sarah’s age actually lamented she thought being big like that would be cool but now she had second thoughts on the matter.



You follow the path of property damage and big footprints.
10 Minutes or so later you’re at the woods near several knocked down trees.
You gulp and entered the large wooded area.
5 Minutes later you hear sobbing.
Oddly it sounded normal size that is till you got closer.
It wasn’t the crying that was loud though.



The 250 Foot tall 4 year old sounded only slightly louder than her normal size.
Her tears though were a different story.
Each tear drop was the size of a mini van.
Every drop made a slightly audible sound as it fell then cracking as it broke tree branches followed by a loud splash and small sound as if a brick had hit the ground.


You carefully approach and navigate towards the young sobbing giantess.
You yell up to her.
“Hey little girl down here”


She stops her full on sob fest but tears are still coming.
She looks around.
“Who’s there?”


You yell a bit louder.
“DOWN HERE LITTLE GIRL”


She looks again and spots you.
“Go away! Stay away from me! I’m a monster! I only hurt everyone even my own family”
she said as more tears fell.


You dodged a couple but one fell on you.
It felt like hitting the pool too fast after diving.
You were drenched but unharmed.
You tried to reason with her.

“You’re not a Monster. None of this was your fault and I can fix you”

Sarah looked at you.

“Y-you mean it?”


“Yea just let me on your hand”


Sarah was hesitant but slowly her giant right hand lowered in front of you flattening a few large rocks with ease.
You climbed up which was a bit tricky and stood in the middle.


“Now bring me up to your face”

Sarah stood up giving you a slight sense of vertigo then held her open palm to her face.
You were a bit intimidated.

She then spoke.

“You know mommy said never ta talk to strangers”

It was odd to hear someone of her size say that but you composed yourself and do introductions.

“So you said you can fix me right mister? How” she asked hopeful.


“With this you say”
You pull the gun out but noticed it’s wet from Sarah’s tear drop and sparking.

Sarah moved her hand a bit closer to her face.

“That sparkly toy can fix me?”


In truth you weren’t sure what with the gun damaged and sparking but you had to try.

“Yea just stay still and you might feel something”


“Ok”


You had no way between the sparks and damage to know what would happen.
You pull the trigger.
This time on top of the usual beam there was what looked like electricity or lightning in the beam.
It struck Sarah right in the nose.
She flinched a bit as it tiickled and tingled.
Her body glows a bit as the energy spreads but a few moments in the the gun smokes and the beam and lightning seem to get weaker and weaker then stop.



“Well did it work” asked Sarah.


“I dunno. Do you feel anything”

“Well I.. wait I do feel something.. like tingly all over”


Then....

114212111212112213212.content:
Well, it seems as if the universe itself hates you. Your attempts to help Sarah had only made things worse. The girl had gone from 250ft tall to a whopping 500ft tall. Maybe trying to use the ray while damaged really was a bad idea.

"Huh?Did it work? Am I small again?" Sarah asked. Once she shook off the cobwebs she soon realized that everything around her looked smaller than before. Even you looked smaller in the palm of her hand. "Wait! I'm still a monster!"

You really felt bad for the girl. She didn't ask for this. She most likely started off the day excited about being the flower girl at that wedding, only to have it ruined by your new size gun and her own brother's stupidity. You were about to say something to try and cheer her up, until you saw the look on her face.

She wasn't sad like you expected. Instead she had a look on her face that you've seen many times before. Anger. She was furious. Furious that your ray didn't fix her like you said it would. Furious that it instead made her an even bigger monster than before. But more importantly... She was furious at you.

You felt yourself trembling as she glared down at you. This wasn't right, four year old's weren't supposed to be intimidating. Then again how many four year old's are 500ft tall and could literally flatten a person like a bug underfoot. She certainly could and did, even if they were accidents.

Your face began to sweat as you started to back away. "Now little -er, big girl. Let's not do anything crazy now."

"You big meanie!" She yelled as tears started to run down her face. "You said your 'toy' could fix me but it made me bigger!"

Things weren't looking so good for you. Sarah was angry and you were small enough that she could potentially kill you in her rage... Or worse. You kept on backing up in her hand until a wall of fingers prevented you from backing up any further. You were trapped.

"Now little girl, it was just an accident! I can fix you, I just need to fix my 'toy' first! It's broken, you see!" You held up the sparkling ray as proof. "If you help me fix it then I can get you back to normal, I promise!"

She didn't look convinced.

"And I can even take you out for ice cream, my treat." You added hastily.

Now Sarah looked a bit conflicted. In her mind you lied to her and her four year old mentality dictates that she react negatively to you. But at the same time the mention of a certain frozen dairy treat made her pause.

What was she going to do?
114212111212112213212.title: Sarah's anger

choices: The size gun goes off in Sarah's stomach
Sarah rampages through the city in her anger
Wexler survived the bird and wants his gun back
1142121112121122132122.content:
After giving it some thought, Sarah began to shake her head. What good was ice cream at her size? It wouldn't make her better and it couldn't make her forget. You promised to fix her and instead made her an even bigger freak. You LIED to her and you were going to pay.

"NO! No! No! No! No! No! You're out of chances!" Sarah screamed.

You felt your heart sink when you heard those words. Sarah wasn't going to give you a second chance even with the promise of ice cream.

"Wait! Little girl, please! I'm sorry, I can fix you, I just need to fix the gun!" You pleaded. Sarah wasn't having any of it though.

"Stop lying to me!" She cried. Seeing her so upset made you wince, but at the same time her size combined with her ire made you more afraid. She brought you closer to her face and you instantly covered your ears at the sound of her booming voice. "You're not gonna mess with me anymore!"

Sarah couldn't recall the last time she felt this angry. Maybe when her brother snuck into her room and ate her secret stash of cupcakes? She was really looking forward to those too. Looking down at you in her palm, she felt her anger spike. You needed to pay, and she knew just how to do it too.

She brought you in closer to her lips and you watched in horror as they parted to reveal a pink and moist cave that was her mouth. Was she going to eat you!?

"No! Anything but that! I'm sorry! Please!" You begged.

Unfortunately for you, Sarah was resolute in her decision. She was going to take a page out of her older brother's book and eat you. Your eyes widen in terror as a large pink serpent exited her maw. That was her tongue!? It was bigger than a bus!

Again you tried to beg but your words fell on def ears. The large pink muscle was coming straight for you and there was no meant to escape. You were helpless to defend yourself as the large tongue barreled into you and coated you in fresh saliva. It was gross and fleshy, and you stuck to it like glue.

Try as you may to break free, you were far to weak. You screamed your little heart out as you passed the enormous lips and gargantuan white pillars Sarah called teeth. She was really going to go through with this. She was really going to eat you.

The light soon faded and you were left in the infinite darkness. The it was hot and humid and the air was stale with what you guessed whatever the giantess had for breakfast. Pancakes maybe? It didn't really matter. What did matter was finding a way out of here.

Meanwhile on the outside, Sarah could feel you against her tongue and began to bat you around like a tennis ball. Over and over again she could feel your miniscule body bounce off her teeth and cheeks. This made her feel somewhat better, but she wouldn't be satisfied until she sent you on your way.

She tilted her head back and began to swallow.

Back on this inside you did your best to survive being thrown around like pinball. Time after time you were thrown into the wet walls of flesh and hard white teeth. It felt as if you were in the world's largest washing machine. You were sloshed around so much you couldn't tell up from down anymore.

Eventually the cycle ceased and your surroundings began to shift. A wave of hot saliva washed over you and you could feel yourself get swept up in the current. It didn't take a genus to figure out what was happening. Sarah was about to swallow.

"No! Someone help me!"

Those were your final words as you descended down the long tube that was Sarah's throat.

Said giant gulped you down like snack and could feel your constant struggling down her throat. That soon faded however as you reached her stomach. She gave it a small pat before taking a seat on the ground. The meanie was gone and she was stuck as a monster.

What would happen to her now?

You yell up to her.
“Hey little girl down here”


She stops her full on sob fest but tears are still coming.
She looks around.
“Who’s there?”


You yell a bit louder.
“DOWN HERE LITTLE GIRL”


She looks again and spots you.
“Go away! Stay away from me! I’m a monster! I only hurt everyone even my own family”
she said as more tears fell.


You dodged a couple but one fell on you.
It felt like hitting the pool too fast after diving.
You were drenched but unharmed.
You tried to reason with her.

“You’re not a Monster. None of this was your fault and I can fix you”

Sarah looked at you.

“Y-you mean it?”


“Yea just let me on your hand”


Sarah was hesitant but slowly her giant right hand lowered in front of you flattening a few large rocks with ease.
You climbed up which was a bit tricky and stood in the middle.


“Now bring me up to your face”

Sarah stood up giving you a slight sense of vertigo then held her open palm to her face.
You were a bit intimidated.

She then spoke.

“You know mommy said never ta talk to strangers”

It was odd to hear someone of her size say that but you composed yourself and do introductions.

“So you said you can fix me right mister? How” she asked hopeful.


“With this you say”
You pull the gun out but noticed it’s wet from Sarah’s tear drop and sparking.

Sarah moved her hand a bit closer to her face.

“That sparkly toy can fix me?”


In truth you weren’t sure what with the gun damaged and sparking but you had to try.

“Yea just stay still and you might feel something”


“Ok”


You had no way between the sparks and damage to know what would happen.
You pull the trigger.
This time on top of the usual beam there was what looked like electricity or lightning in the beam.
It struck Sarah right in the nose.
She flinched a bit as it tiickled and tingled.
Her body glows a bit as the energy spreads but a few moments in the the gun smokes and the beam and lightning seem to get weaker and weaker then stop.



“Well did it work” asked Sarah hoping not to remain 250 Feet tall.


“I dunno. Do you feel anything”

“Well I.. wait I do feel something.. like tingly all over”


Then....
11421211121211221323.title: Shrinking options ( reserved )

114212111212112213233.content:
You pull the trigger on the shrink ray, aimed at the giant 4 year old. The beam strikes Sara right in the nose. After several moments the beam fades away.

You then notice Sarah beginning to diminish in size. It worked, she is shrinking!

"Hey mister, it's working," Sarah booms, her voice echoing throughout the forest.

You stare in amazement. She's right, Sarah has already diminished back to a "mere" hundred feet tall. Best of all, she is still shrinking. At this rate she should be back to normal in no time.

Several more minutes pass and she is back to her original size. "Thank you mister," she yells and runs to give you a hug. As she is hugging you, you feel something is not right. This poor girl is still shrinking.

"Oh crap," you say under your breathe.

"Huh?" Sarah says, before realizing what is going on. You then hear continue to scream as she has now reached a measly 1 foot tall. "Help me!" she squeaks. It sounds like she is crying again.

You have now lost sight of Sarah. Carefully dropping down to your knees, you begin to scan the grass around you. Your heart sinks as you realize you may have lost this girl forever.

Then you hear a tiny squeak from the grass, as you move closer, you can see Sarah, now the size of a pea, a tiny 1/4 inch tall. "Are you okay?" you whisper.

Sarah is taking in the new forest of grass that surrounds her when she sees your face. Naturally her first reaction is to scream and start running the other way. She doesn't get far though as she is quickly engulfed in your hand and airlifted high into the sky.

You can here her hysterical cries in your palm. "It's okay," you tell her. "I can fix this."

Before you can do anything, you hear people close by. In fact, they're very close. It's the wedding party, including the bride as well as Sarah's mother and sister. You have to act fast. Grabbing the shrink ray, you prepare to grow Sarah back but realize the battery is dead. "Fuck," you say to yourself. This would have to wait.

The wedding party will be here any second. Thoughts begin to race through your head. You could take Sarah home and grow her back later. That way she could return home and everything would be alright. You could return her to her family, but they would no doubt have questions for why she suddenly shrunk.

The third choice was a bit more cynical, but you could just leave her in the grass and let fate decide what happens.

114212111212221.content:
This was truly weird. After the bright flash you were still on Tiffany's giant red toenail, but the carpet that was your surrounding area was darker and more expansive than before.

Suddenly there was a huge commotion in the church. A cacophony of screams and yells floods the soundscape as people search for the bride that disappeared in an instant. One voice, however, was a lot softer than the rest.

"Hello? Where is everyone? Help me!" the voice shouted, directly above you. You sighed. Of all the people to accidentally shrink at a wedding, of course it just so happened to be the bride. "Calm down Tiff," she told herself. "This is all just a bad dream... right?" You kinda felt bad for her. Her wedding was ruined, and she was the size of a speck in the midst of it. You wished you could help her, but you were too small--

"Wait a minute," you think out loud. "If Tiffany shrunk as well, then why am I still-- <i>oh, no...</i>"

The realization hits you like an 18-wheeler. Just before Tiffany was hit by the size gun, you landed back on her toenail, causing you to shrink proportionally along with her. While the tiny bride was just a speck to a regular person, you were a speck in comparison to <i>her</i>! You thought you had it bad before; now you were truly an insignificant being.

At this point you weren't sure what to do. If the size gun was still at Tiffany's scale, you had no chance of using it at this size. Not to mention, Tiffany nor the other wedding guests didn't even know about the size ray (heck, the latter group didn't even know where the bride was). If the gun was at your scale, it'd be downright impossible to find.

Tiffany screamed in terror as incalculably large footsteps crashed around you two. Another reason to stay put-- you'd be absolutely fucked if you crossed paths with one of the wedding guests. But if you didn't look for the size gun, then there was absolutely no chance either of you would be normal size again.

You had to act soon-- what do you do?

11421211121222121.content:
Tiffany's fiancé, Dave, was confused beyond belief. He was just the happiest guy alive, watching his beautiful bride to be walk down the aisle, and then just like that, she vanished. None of this makes any sense, he thought. People don't just vanish into thin air? Surely she still had to be around here somewhere.

Along with the majority of other wedding guests, Dave for up and looked around. He saw something unusual on the ground near him, it was Tiffany's open toed shoes.

After a wire a tiresome sprint to reach the safety of the massive sandals, Tiffany, along with her uninvited guest (you), had reached the base of the sandals. Using her last ounces of strength, Tiffany hauled her speck sized body up and onto the sole of the sandal. She collapsed in exhaustion. "Thank god for spin class," she laughed to herself.

What the two of you soon realized, was this happened just in time too. Soon the pair of sandals were lifted skyward, Tiffany screaming, and your micro sized body screaming on the tiny woman's toe.

A massive face soon filled Tiffany's field of vision, a face she recognized as Dave. "Honey down here! It's me," the tiny woman screamed and waved her arms.

Dave was confused as to why Tiffany's shoes would still be here. One of them even had a tiny white speck on it. The thought of dust made Dave's nose itch. He needed to sneeze and could not hold it in.

Suddenly, a massive hurricane force blew Tiffany (and you) high into the air. You both scream as Tiffany floats towards Dave's body off the sneeze.

As she gets closer, Tiffany's eyes widen as she realizes she is preparing to land...

As if the laws of physics had decided to go easy on you and your slightly larger companion, the strong winds of a sneeze send you slightly upward and onto the man's nose. "Oomph!" Tiffany grunted as she crashed onto the skin-colored mountain. Leaving no time to take everything in, the tiny bride stood up and began climbing up her fiancé's face. She had to get to Dave's eye, close enough so that he could finally see her. She wasn't sure if or how she'd get back to normal, but getting seen would make everything much easier.

Getting to the eye, however, was far from easy. This part of her giant husband-to-be's face was almost completely vertical, and one slip would cost Tiffany her life, or at the very least her chance of being found. She climbed, precariously hugging the "wall". Spin class could not have prepared her for this.

A bit lower down, you were having other problems. The botched landing had knocked you off the bride's toenail, and now she was heading off without you. "No no no-- wait up!", you yell as you chase after her, knowing full well she couldn't hear you. You were so small that the steepness of the climb didn't faze you at all. Running on individual skin cells was much easier, but each step the speck-sized woman took outpaced yours 50 times over. Not to mention you had to avoid getting stepped on; that'd be one pathetic way to go out.

After a couple terrifying minutes, the chase ended as the two of you reached a giant eyeball. Tiffany yelled, waved, and jumped, in a vain attempt to get noticed, and you all but dived back onto her toenail, completely exhausted over that ordeal. The wedding dress completely obscured your view from here, but you hoped this lady would be able to grab her husband's attention.

Tiffany stood there in her beautiful wedding dress, in front of her future husband's massive eyeball. She stared at the milky white pool, making all the possible movements she could in a desperate attempt to get his attention.

While you were kept on the dark as to the status of Tiffany's rescue mission, due to the elongated wedding dress, you were now on a mission to get rescued yourself. You knew it was very important to get Tiffany's attention. Even if the giant fiancé of hers recognized her, neither of them knew about the shrink ray, much less where it was. You start to trek up Tiffany's giant foot towards her legs. You knew it would be perilous but you had to find a way to get her attention.

Tiffany had yet to gain the attention of Dave, but she was not giving up yet. Near the corner of his eye, her screams to be noticed nearly transformed to screams of terror as suddenly, a massive pupil darted over to the corner of the eye, and seemed to be trying to focus in on her.

Dave was confused, astonished, and worst of all, heartbroken. How could his wife just vanish into thin air, on their wedding day of all days. He did not want to give up hope, and something on the bridge of his nose caught his eye.

Closing one eye to focus better; Dave's pupil zoomed towards the peculiar white object. It looked like a strange white speck, except it wasn't moving.

"What the...." Dave whispered as he carefully raised an index finger up to his face and scooped up the white speck.

Dave's mind drifted back to that peculiar white speck on Tiffany's sandal. This must've been the same one, but what was it.

Lifting her up to get a better view, Tiffany was trying harder than ever to distinguish herself.

Examining her, what does Dave think?

Things were not going much better for you at all. The size of a speck...to a speck, you would be invisible to Dave. You had two chances for survival here. Either Tiffany found you and then eventually, the shrink ray, or Tiffany had to grow back then find you. Either way, you were in deep trouble.
