Bigger and bigger you grew the ground cracking under your increasing size and weight. You grew and grew and grew filling up the street. You continued to grown until you were 250 Feet tall. Of course it seemed less with your crawling position.

Previously you were eye level with the roofs of 7 story buildings now even crawling you'd be on par with a 12 story building at least maybe 13.


Still not grasping what happened toddler you continues into the business district .
131322212212211.title: Uh-oh

choices: 3 years old. Uh oh this isn't fun!
13133.content:
The gun activates and fires at Mrs. Wood. At first nothing seems to happen until you notice Ms. wood is shrinking? Wait no she's not just shrinking she's getting younger.

Ms. Woods looks at you then herself in panic as her clothes grow looser and looser

She stops at
13133.title: A non size related function activates

132.content:
You shudder for a moment as you recognize the voice of the person entering the room, and in walks Susan, one of the bubblier Sorority girls on campus. She sees you and furrows her brow a little, before saying "Well obviously you're not Mr. Wexler. Do you know where he is?"

"N-n-n-no," you stammer out. "Can't say I know where he's at." Technically thats true, as the bird could be anywhere, and he's most likely inside it. "What do you want with him?" you ask, curiosity getting the better of you.

"Well..." she starts, before bouncing a little into the room, "something happened where I got signed up for one of his classes, and I don't even, like, like science."

"Yeah," you start out, "something like that happened to me too."

"Like, really? That's so weird. What are the odds of that happening?" Apparently pretty good you think, as she starts poking and prodding items on the various tables. You pick up your bag and are just about to reach for the size gun when Susan's hand darts out and grabs it. "Like check out this weird little squirt gun...I think it's a squirt gun. It's at least a toy."

Before you can respond though, she shoots the gun, which was last set on grow. But at what?
132.title: Susan, a bubbly sorority girl

choices: Outside so she can grow without hitting her head
1322.content:
"Owwww!" Susan yells as she suddenly shoots up to about 12 feet tall, hitting her head on the ceiling. And then she looks down and sees you, to which she mutters "Oh, my, god..."

"Ummm, you grew." is all you can stammer out, staring up at this bubbly giant.

She looks over the gun some and notices the dials, and switches it back to shrink, at which she shoots herself again and goes back down to about five and a half feet tall. Once she's back to normal she literally starts bouncing around the room saying "Oh my god, oh my god!" over and over, until finally transitioning to "This is going to be so sweet!" Here she looks at you, and says "And since you were here with me when I found this, you can come with me and have fun with it too!" She lets out a little squeal, and before you can tell her of your own encounter with it before she came in, she grabs your hand and pulls you with her out of the room.

Where is she pulling you to?
1322.title: Grows herself

13221.content:
She takes you back to her sorority house on campus. The way there she couldn't stop saying "like" and "oh my god." She pulls me up to her room on the second floor. No one else was there because they were all at their classes.
"Ok. Are you ready?" she asked.
"Uh... ready for what?" I asked.
"What do you think silly? We're going to have all sorts of fun with this ray gun thingy!" Then before I could react she shrunk me to...
13221.title: Her sorority house

132211.content:
As the tingle of the energy ray shoots at and through you, the only thing that you can do is watch as Susan looms, then towers over you. Her smile widens as you get smaller until you could swear her lips part from ear to ear.

"Well look at you! How's the view from down there little guy? You're just about the same size as my little sister's dolls... or my old parrot! Oooh, that gives me a great idea!"

Here she reaches in and wraps a hand around your waist, encasing your arms. She tosses the size gun onto her bed and carries you over to her closet, and after a few moments of searching that leaves you dizzy, she exclaims "Yes!" When your head ceases to spin you see what she found and it's...
132211.title: 9 inches

choices: Not long, maybe an hour later
Several hours, you end up napping on the cage bottom
1322112.content:
"You can't put me in there, I'm not a pet!"

"No you're not, you're so much more. Wait till you see what I have in mind!" She drops you inside the cage, then closes the door. A moment later she's pulling a shirt over the cage, and you're left in a dim cage where you can barely see your hand in front of your face.

"Now no peeking little man, and don't you even think of going anywhere!" She giggles, as if you even could get out, and her footsteps thump away into the distance. After a while you're able to make your way to the cage door, and are able to get the door unlocked with a fair bit of effort. But with the shirt stretched over the cage you have no way to get the door open.

Beyond the shirt you can hear Susan walking around, her footsteps thumping across the floor every so often. She also spends a fair amount of time on the phone as a few stray words make their way to your ears. "...gonna be amazing... so tiny... oh my god... like... they won't even understand!"

When does Susan shine light on you again?
1322112.title: A parrot cage

choices: A dozen ladies have formed a circle around your cage
13221122.content: You're woken up with a start as the cage is moved. Outside you can hear a couple voices, and though you can't make out the words you can tell it's at least four girls. It quiets down outside, and then a few minutes later the shirt is removed from the cage. When the light no longer blinds you, you're shocked to see
13221122.title: Several hours later

132211222.content:
It's hard to comprehend just how small you are now, until Susan's fingernail comes right up against the cage and you see you're as tall as it's long. Susan is doing something with the top of the cage, but your eyes are glued to the nail in front of you and the sloppy design which must look amazing at regular size.
After a few more moments of her fiddling with the top of the cage, she lifts your container up at stomach churning speed, before a little jostle and then you're relatively still.

"Wow," you hear a girl say. "That looks fantastic!"

Looking out from the cage you notice that Susan and another girl are looking into a mirror. And then you spot your cage with your hands gripping onto the bars. Your cage has been made into an earring. And you're hanging from
132211222.title: Susan shrunk you to earring size!

1322112221.content:
You looked out, partially in horror, somewhat in fascination as Susan and the other ginger girl examined the ear ring, both of them grinning wildly, but Susan with a slightly mischievous curl in her smile. In order for you to hang from her ear...you had to be much smaller. The cage was probably an inch tall, at best, making you...much smaller. And hanging precariously from her earlobe.

"Wow, Susan! That's such a cute ear-ring! Where'd you get the idea for the cage design?" asks the other girl, causing Susan to rapidly turn her head to face her...sending you sprawling and slamming you into a side of the cage. "It just came to me one day. Cute, though, isn't it?" The other girl got much closer to examine it, and replied "Yeah, it's cute, but it almost looks like something's in there!" "Oh, there is. But that's not important. What IS important is..."
1322112221.title: Blonde Susan's ear

choices: "I think someone needs to be punished."
13221122211.content:
You bang on the side of the cage, frustrated by how bad things have gotten. You've been stuffed in a cage. shrunken to an unbelievably small size, and she acts like you're not even worth noticing? You'll get out of here and make her pay!

You're thoughts are interrupted by Susan's booming voice. "Look at what I found." she says the size ray comes into view. You've got to get to that gun, but how? Suddenly it hits you, you had unlocked the door before she shrunk the cage! You can get out!

"So you found a squirt gun, so what?" the red haired girl asks, not quite sure what her friend was getting at.

Ignoring their conversation you run over to the door and open it. Luckily the door is facing forward, so you're able to leap towards the gun.

"This isn't a squirt gun, it's a gun with the ability to change a person's size!" Susan practically squeals.

The squealing hurts your ears but you start to back up to the edge of the cage, for someone your size jumping from place to place would be damn near impossible without a running start.

"Seriously? Even I'm not stupid enough to believe that." the red haired girl states in denial. "But it's true!" Susan pleads with her friend to believe her. "Prove it to me then." the other girl replies. Susan moves her head so the red haired girl can get a good look at you.

You've tuned out their conversation, trying to listen in just hurt your ears and you had to focus on getting to that gun. You weren't sure what you would do once you jumped onto it but it would be a start. As soon as you start to run the gun disappears from your sight and the cage begins to rock back and forth which makes you trip. You for a while and come to a stop right in front of the open cage door and come face to massive face with the red haired girl.

She does a small gasp and you take a good look at her. Her face is HUGE! Her eyes dwarf you, her nose looks like a small hill, and her mouth is a huge gaping chasm. "So cute!" she exclaims, her breath threatening to knock you back. She then takes another look and seems to realize what you were about to do. "Bad little man." she scolds.

"What's going on?" Susan asks.

"I think he was trying to escape." the red haired girl explains.

What is Susan's reaction?
13221122211.title: "...this toy I found!"

choices: Continue your plan to escape and get the gun(  lucky break)
Continue your plan to escape and get the gun ( unlucky breaks )
Susan shrinks her friend as payback for her being doubtful
132211222111.content:
"Who cares we can just make more! Besides what can he do" said Susan.

You are grateful Susan seems unconcerned.


Next..
132211222111.title: "Who cares? We can make more."

choices: Susan felt an itch on her face (aka you!)
You took too long, Susan and Katie are already outside!
1322112221112.content:
"Yeah I guess you're right." The red haired girl eventually agrees. "I guess it was a bit stupid of me to be worried about someone I could crush with my pinkie."

As she says this she puts her pinkie finger up next to the cage, and your entire view is filled with the pinkie. Her fingertip alone is as large as the cage, and that means it towers over you. "Alright Katie I think that's enough, you'll have plenty of opportunities to play with your toys later. Right now we have work to do." Susan announces.

Suddenly the massive appendage retreats and your greeted with the familiar site of Katie's face. "Alright fine." she whines at her friends orders and turns her attention away from you.

"So what are we going to do?" Katie asks.

"Well taking time to shrink a lot of people individually would be pretty boring, so that's why I figured we could just shrink the entire college instead." Susan announces evilly.

The entire college?! An entire buildings worth of people reduced to nothing but toys for these power hungry girls. And hell they certainly wouldn't stop there, what's to stop them from shrinking down even bigger buildings filled with even more people? You need to stop them, but they're right. What can you do at your size? You begin to push yourself off the ground. No, you need to push those thoughts out of your head. If you can just get to the gun you'll be able to set things right. You stand up and re-open the cage door (it had been closed when Katie put her finger up against it.).

The cage begins to shake, they must be moving. The first few "shockwaves" knock you down but eventually you get used to it. You look out at the opening and realize that since Susan isn't holding the gun in front of her you can't just jump out the door like you originally planned. You look down to see if she put the gun in her pocket and see nothing. Damnit, she must of put it in her other pocket. You'll have to move to the other side of her body, but how are you going to do that? You look back around and realize your only option is to shimmy along the side of the cage, jump onto her face, and get to the other side from there.

You look down over the edge and realize just how long of a drop it is, your vision gets hazy before you can even seen the bottom. You shake your head and block out all of your fears. You have to get that gun, not just for your own sake but for everyone else as well.

You take a small step forward and step onto the small rim that goes around the outside of the cage. Then you grab one of the bars and let your left foot join the rest of your body outside of the cage. You begin to move towards Susan's cheek, gripping the bars so hard your knuckles are white.

Side step and grab a new bar, side step and grab a new bar. This goes on for about a minute until you reach your destination. Now you're going to have to turn around and jump. You gulp and reluctantly let go of the bars. You turn on your heel very slowly, once your fully turned around you're once again amazed and terrified of how small you are. Susan's cheek looks as big as three football stadiums.

You launch yourself towards your destination and flew through the air for a couple of seconds, eventually you slam into her and your hands instinctively close and each grab a hand full of flesh.

You did it! Now you just have to somehow get to the other side of her head. You realize your legs and dangling and pull them up closer to your stomach, firmly planting your feet on her cheek. You're pretty sure that's the position mountain climbers get into. You decide to climb straight up to the top of her head and go from there.

Unfortunately before you even get to start climbing you realize that all of your hard work was in vain because...
1322112221112.title: Susan's Master Plan.

choices: Maybe your luck's not as bad as you thought.
Lady luck decided you should take a fall.
13221122211121.content:
You were beginning to feel good about all this, sure you had a long way to go but you seemed to be doing fine so far. Unfortunately luck was a cruel mistress that could turn on a dime. You were suddenly consumed in shadow. You slowly turn your head and watch as Susan's massive fingers are heading right for you! You quickly scramble up the side of the bubbly teens face.

Her fingers strike just below you and she begins scratching. The sound chills you to the bone. You look down and realize just how deadly those nails are, if you hadn't reacted when you did you'd be cleaved in half right now. You notice something else though, she seems to be scratching with her left hand. The reason this is relevant is because you're on the right side of her face.

Wait a minute! If you jumped onto one of her fingers now, then when she moved her arm back you could get a free ride to the Size gun! You knew that she wasn't going to scratch forever so you make a hasty decision and let go. You fall for a second and land on the nail of her index finger. Luckily the fall wasn't all that long, even for someone your size. Other wise landing on that nail would've been...well let's just say it wouldn't of been fun.

Unfortunately luck apparently decided to dick with you again since Susan decided to move her hand back before you can get your bearings. Normally this would've been fine but you weren't ready for the sudden acceleration, you only had a second to react.

Did you manage to grab a hold of her finger or were you launched away at mach 1?
13221122211121.title: Susan felt an itch on her face (aka you!)

choices: Nope, they make it to the college uninterrupted.
132211222111211.content:
The moment you felt movement you dove forward and managed to grab some of her skin, the hand continued to move at impossible speeds before slowing down. You're suffering from a little bit of whiplash but you hung on, which is much better than the alternative. You shudder to think about what would have happened if you fell. Despite your fear you look down and realize that her hand is still moving, swinging a bit as she's walking. It's no where near as bad as before but still, if you were to try to drop into her pocket from here well momentum would probably still launch you to your death via floor. Looks like you're going to have to wait until she stops walking. Which means you'll have to wait until she gets to her destination...which is the college full of people she's about to shrink. Still clinging onto Susan's massive finger for dear life you begin to pray that someone will interrupt them and give you enough time to at least drop onto the gun.

Are your prayers answered...
132211222111211.title: Maybe your luck's not as bad as you thought.

choices: "All the settings are fine." (She didn't find you)
1322112221112111.content:
You realize that your prayers aren't going to be answered as the two girls continue to walk past some of the other sorority members, you had hoped they would see one of their friends and stop to talk for at least a little, no such luck though. You can do nothing as they approach the front door, luckily Katie was the one to push the door open. You don't think you could hold on if Susan's hand was to go upwards like that. Susan walks through the open door and you're blinded by the light, you couldn't even put a hand up to your face to shield your eyes from some of the sunlight.

Eventually though your vision comes back and you look to your side and see the college, you had forgotten how close the Sorority house and campus were. It continues to get bigger and bigger as the girls approach. The building as a whole is probably the size of a continent compared to you. Eventually Susan finally stops walking, her hand coming to a stop right above her pocket that has the shrink ray. Alright it's now or never. You let go of her finger and the now all too familiar feeling of weightlessness hits you as you fall.

You land on the shrink ray, your weightlessness actually let you not necessarily float down but it definitely lessened what would normally be a fatal or at least injury inducing fall. 'Guess being this small isn't all bad' you think to yourself. Now you just have to find out where you are on the shrink ray. The pocket's pretty dark so you're not given too much light to work with but you eventually determine that you're on the handle and that the buttons and knobs are below you. You just start randomly reaching downwards, hoping you'll be able to reach something. After a few attempts, you do! You determine that it's some kind of knob, you're not sure what it does but it's better than nothing. You reach for it again, hoping to be able to move it.

Suddenly what little light you had before is blocked out and you hear Susan speak.

"Alright no one's watching, let's do it now."

You look up and see her football field sized hand going to reach for the gun. The moment her hand makes contact with the gun the ground underneath your feet begins to shake. Just her simple touch is enough to create an earthquake for someone your size. You lose your footing and begin to fall. You desperately try to find a hand hold, your hand touches the knob from earlier and in a split second decision you manage to wrap your arms around it. Suddenly you're hit with vertigo as her hand wraps around the handle of the gun and she lifts it out of her pocket.

As the sunlight hits your eyes you can finally see what exactly you've grabbed onto, it's the knob that determines Shrink or Grow! This is perfect! Except it's not, as you realize that despite the fact that you've gotten to your destination you have no way of accomplishing your goal since you're dangling from god knows how high, barely able to even wrap your arms around the knob let alone move it.

The gun moves again as she aims it at the college, you've failed.

"These bugs won't know what hit 'em." Susan says with a mischevious smirk on her face.

"Wait a minute!" Katie interrupts Susan.

"What is it?!" Susan replies, angry that Katie just ruined the moment.

"Shouldn't you double check the gun, just to make sure all the settings are in order, we wouldn't want to make a mistake when we're this close." Katie advises her friend.

"Ugh, fine!" Susan replies.

Susan moves the gun closer to her face, a little to quickly for your liking. You barely manage to hold on. Wait a minute, she's going to check the ray gun. She's going to see you! You watch as Susan's eyes take a quick look over the settings on the gun. She stops and narrows her eyes when she gets to your switch. You gulp, you do not want to be in this woman's way. Nothing you can do now but hope she didn't notice you. You hold your breath as Susan says...
1322112221112111.title: Nope, they make it to the college uninterrupted.

13221122211121111.content:
"You again?!" Susan yells, obviously surprised that some one as small as you could still be alive. She calms down after a second though and goes back into playful mode.

"My, My I'm impressed that a pathetic little thing like you could make it so far..." She moves the gun onto it's side and you're stuck dangling...well even more than before. "...but I'm sorry to say that you're not going to be getting any farther." Your grip doesn't last for very long and you fall towards her other waiting hand.

You land on your back, which knocks the wind right out of you. You try to sit up but vertigo hits you once again as Susan brings her hand closer to her face. She stops when her hand is level with her mouth. You begin to stand up and are almost thrown off her face due to her breathing. Every inhale threatens to swallow you whole and every exhale threatens to knock you off her palm. You look up and see her glaring daggers at you. Seeing that sends shivers down your spine, you spin around on your heel and begin running as fast as you can.

"Oh no you're not going anywhere this time." Susan says as a large object begins to fill your vision, it's the barrel of the shrink ray! You try to run the other way but all you see is Susan's smirking face. "I don't know how you got this far, but I promise you that it won't happen again." Susan threatens. You hopelessly watch as the barrel of the shrink ray begins to glow.

"STOP!" Katie cries.

"What is it this time?!" Susan angrily turns to her friend.

"You don't have to shrink him further do you? You were the one who said 'What could he do?' and besides, I really wanted to play with that one." Katie says.

You're a bit conflicted. You're thankful for the save, no matter how brief but the fact that Katie sees you as nothing but a toy kind of scares you.

"Look Katie we're about to get a lot more. This one knows too much." Susan explains. You decide that this would be the perfect time to run but the moment you try it Susan cups her hand, forcing you back into the middle of her palm.

"Yeah but this is our first Shrinkee, we should keep him around as a super special toy!" Katie exclaims to her friend while staring at you with stars in her eyes.

"You're such a child. Alright fine, if you can find me some change we'll flip a coin, if I win I get to shrink him down to nothing more than a grain of sand. If you win then you get to play with him however you want." Susan decides. Neither option seemed all that appealing but there was nothing you could do about it. Katie eagerly shoves a hand into her pocket and pulls out a quarter the size of a small building. "Alright I'll be heads, and you're tails." Katie says while getting the coin into position.

"Fine by me." Susan agrees.

Katie flicks the coin up into the air, you try to follow it but after a certain point it hurt your neck. A second later it comes crashing back down onto her palm.

It landed on...
13221122211121111.title: "You again?!"  (She found you)

choices: You wrestle the gun from Katie
Katie fires angerily and ends up turning Susan into a giantess
Katie decides to enlarge herself into a giantess
132211222111211111.content:
It landed on heads.

Katie was happy she won. Hastily she held the gun on you.

"And now to make sure you're no longer a problem" she said.


The Ray powers up and she zaps you.


Moments later you much to Katie and Susan's displeasure are back to normal size.



Next...
132211222111211111.title: Heads

choices: Nope, you dove right into the blast.
You made it, the beam hits her palm. (Both you and Susan shrink)
132211222111211112.content:
Katie stares at the coin and gives a heavy sigh. Meanwhile Susan's attention turns back to you and a smile begins to form on her face. You gulp as you realize who won the coin flip.

Katie shoves the coin back into her pocket, obviously dissapointed. "Oh don't worry Katie, like I said before we're about to get more 'toys' than we'll know what to do with, let me deal with this pest." Susan comforts her friend while making sure not to keep her eyes off you.

The barrel of the gun comes back into your view. Susan double checks to make sure it's on shrink then turns her attention back to you.

"I wonder how small you'll get, I'm assuming about the size of a grain of sand but who knows, maybe you'll be even smaller than that!" Susan says enthusiastically.

"Sorry little guy, I wish it didn't have to be this way. We would've had so much fun." Katie says while waving you goodbye.

The ray gun begins to charge up.

"How does it feel knowing that in a few seconds you'll only be visible through a microscope?" Susan taunts.

Susan fires the gun and in a split second decision you decide to dive forwards in one last gambit to avoid the blast.

Does it suceed?
132211222111211112.title: Tails

choices: You've got no other choice. (Get Susan's attention)
Screw her, you'll improvise. (Attempt escape on your own.)
1322112221112111122.content:
You watch as the blue energy beam shoots out of the gun, straight for you. You dive forward, hoping that you could avoid becoming a microbe. You close your eyes, too terrified to know if you succeeded or not. All's quite for a few seconds. But eventually you hear a loud crash, like something had fallen to the ground.

"Oh my God." you hear Katie say breathlessly, her voice sounded a lot louder than it did before though. Oh God! You really had failed, who knows how small you are now. Slowly you open your eyes, fearing the worst. When you open them you see Susan...who while still big looked about the same size she was before. I guess she completely missed? Your eyes begin to look upwards, expecting Susan to be looking down at you in anger or something like that. What you saw surprised you, it wasn't anger, nor was it disbelief that she missed, the look on her face was fear. The hand not holding you was covering her mouth. Wait a minute what happened to the shrink gun?

You didn't have time to think about that though since you noticed another detail that disturbed you, Susan seemed to be looking up. What could she possibly be looking at? You had a feeling you were going to regret it but you turned around. And suddenly it all made sense. There was the shrink ray, towering over both you and Susan. It seemed to be the size of a small country from your perspective. All the knobs and buttons the size of small cities. The shock of how small you are getting to you, you pass out.

Your eyes flutter open and you find yourself looking at a pink ceiling. You sit up and set your hand down on whatever you're laying on. Plastic? You must be in a dollhouse. which really isn't all that surprising. Aren't you a little too small for a dollhouse though? Guess they restored your size. That would be the most logical explanation, then again when you were last conscious Katie had complete control of the gun. Who knows what her mind came up with. You better be prepared for anything.

You slide your legs off the plastic bed and stand up. You make your way through the dollhouse to the front door, making note of the fact that everything seems to be perfectly fit for someone your size...whatever size you are. You're not sure what you're going to see when you open up the door so you mentally prepare yourself for anything. You quickly grab the knob and throw the door open, not wanting to keep yourself in suspense.

The door flies open and you see...more pink? You touch the floor and yep, it's plastic too. So you were in a dollhouse...inside another dollhouse? It's like doll-ception or something. You look around and see that everything around you is huge, like it was designed for someone much bigger than you. You look around and realize that you're once again in a bedroom, the dollhouse was set on the floor. You turn your attention to the bed, craning your neck upward to find Susan asleep on top of it.

So if Susan is inside a dollhouse...that must mean that Katie kept Susan at whatever size she shrunk herself to. Which means she didn't restore your size. Which means that Katie must be...your head hurts just trying to imagine how big she would be from your perspective. You keep staring at Susan, wondering what to do next. The next step would probably be getting out of the dollhouse but that's going to be difficult at your size, and even if you could get out what good would that do? You're way too tiny to do anything to Katie or the gun. Then again Susan's probably going to be gunning for you when you wake up, you partially being the reason she shrunk and all.

You ultimately come to a decision...
1322112221112111122.title: Shrink-ception.

choices: Slow and steady wins the race. (Reach her face)
You need help now. (Attack her foot)
13221122211121111221.content:
You sigh, you're not exactly excited about it but Susan is the only person who even knows about your presence. Plus as stated earlier you're way to small to do anything on your own. You push down all of your fears and doubts about what you're doing. Now how are you going to get up there. You take another look at Susan, you notice that Susan actually seems to be covered in a blanket. Katie must've done shrunk one down for her. That's awfully convenient.

You walk over and grab a hold of the blanket and give it a tug. Good, it'll definitely hold you. You take two hand fulls of the fabric and climb upwards. Luckily Susan didn't seem to move much in her sleep, which kept the blanket stable.

Your arms were on fire but eventually you haul yourself up onto the bed. You stand up and see that you're near Susan's legs. Should you climb onto her and get to her face and get her attention from there or should you take the quicker but riskier route and just attack her foot?
13221122211121111221.title: You've got no other choice. (Get Susan'...

choices: There's a large sound from outside the dollhouse.
132211222111211112211.content:
You look up and see that even when she's laying down Susan's legs tower over you. You shudder a bit at getting that reminder of how small you were. You grab a handful of her jeans and climb up, much like when you were climbing up the bed your arms hurt but you fought through the pain to haul yourself up, ending up near her thigh. You slowly stand up on her leg, making sure not to lose your balance. As you look out you realize that her leg is as wide as a highway and her body is about as long as one. You don't know very many highways that have two large hills in the middle of the road though.

You begin your long trek, it's actually pretty boring. You're just walking forward. Eventually you reach her waist. You step onto the fabric of her shirt and continue walking forward, eventually you reach the twin peaks. You stare upward, not really sure if you should do try to climb up over them. Sure it'll be the quicker method but if Susan wakes up and sees you on her breasts well...

Luckily or unluckily you didn't have to make a choice because...
132211222111211112211.title: Slow and steady wins the race. (Reach her face)

choices: A large bedroom (with Katie nowhere to be seen)
1322112221112111122111.content:
Suddenly ground under you begins to shake. A large yawn erupts from ahead of you. Oh crap, she's waking up. You're nowhere near her face. As you say this she starts to sit up, the ground under you begins to slant and you fall backwards. You back meets denim as you land on her lap.

"What was that?" Susan mumbles tiredly. You stare upwards as Susan tilts her head downward, her blonde hair draped around her shoulders you can see that she's staring right at you. You watch as her eyes go wide. You begin to rethink your plan to contact her and jump up to your feet. You begin to run away, you reach the edge of her lap and you jump off, landing on the blanket in between her thighs. The ground underneath you begins to shift as she sits Indian style, effectively trapping you.

You keep running anyway and stop just before you run into her leg. You start pounding on the fleshy wall in desperation, obviously it doesn't do anything. You start thinking about trying to climb up and over her legs but before you can put that plan into action you're swallowed up by flesh.

Your prison opens up and you find yourself in a familiar position, sitting in Susan's palm looking up at her face. Instead of seething with rage like you expected she's actually looking around, more curious than anything.

"I-I think, we're in a dollhouse." You say nervously, thinking that if you help her she might take it easy on you. Susan's eyes lock back onto you. "K-Katie must've put us in here, in fact I was in an even smaller dollhouse before venturing out here." You say while nervously pointing to said dollhouse. Susan looks to her side and sees that you're telling the truth.

"UGH! That bitch, she should've restored me back to normal size, just wait until I get my hands on her!" Susan's sudden outburst makes you shrink (metaphorically) back in fear. Those predatory eyes look at you again. "But she's not the only one to blame for my stature now is she?" She asks rhetorically. "This was a very bad idea!" You think to yourself. You, still sitting down begin to scramble backwards in fear. Unfortunately for you, Susan cups her hand prematurely cutting off your escape. You tumble face first into the middle of her palm. You begin to pick yourself off the ground and notice a large object heading straight for you.

It was Susan's thumb, three times as large as you are coming to crush you. You curl up into a ball, not knowing what else to do. You wait for the immense pressure but it never comes. You open your eyes and see that her thumb stopped an inch above you. It suddenly retreats and your vision is once again filled by Susan's visage.

She sighs, "As much as I would like to make you nothing more than a red smear between my fingers I'm not sure if Katie will listen to me so I need some kind of bargaining chip. She seems to see you as some special prize so if she listens to me then I get back to normal, but if she doesn't..." she trails off, letting the implications hang in the air.

"Now where should I put you?" She ponders, flattening out the hand holding you while putting her other hand on her chin. Her eyes travel downward and you follow her gaze, you realize that she's looking at her cleavage. "Nah, that'd be too good for you." Susan says, quickly shutting down any thoughts you had about having an enjoyable ride. After a couple more seconds her face lights up.

You get a feeling of vertigo as the hand holding you rises. You just close your eyes and try not to focus on the pit in your stomach. Eventually the sensation stops and you open your eyes coming face to face with the damn thing that got you into this mess in the first place. Susan's makeshift cage earring.

"Get in." Susan orders. You begrudgingly walk across her palm and step into the cage. "Now I know you can escape, but I wouldn't recommend it. Like it or not you have to rely on me now. You're nothing more than a dust mite." Susan says, reminding you of just how deep of a hole you've gotten yourself into. You close the door and lock it, not wanting to accidentally fly out while Susan's walking. "Good boy." she says. She taps the cage, knocking you all around.

"Let's get going, then." Susan announces while sliding her legs off the plastic bed. Meanwhile you're just trying to keep yourself from slamming into the bars of the cage too much. Susan stands up and begins stretching. She raises her arms above her head, intentionally or unintentionally her hand slams (Well it was probably more like a tap from her perspective.) into the bottom of the cage which much like every other movement she makes made the cage swing all over the place. "Whoops, sorry little guy." she says sarcastically.

After that little event she begins to start walking. "So I've been wondering something..." Susan starts to talk (her voice sounded surprisingly friendly) as she opens up the bedroom door and walks out into some sort of hallway. "...If you woke up in that dollhouse I saw earlier, then why where you on my bed. Were you trying to sneak a peek?" she says teasingly. "No." You say defensively. "I figured you would need my help, so I went to go wake you up." you say, trying to sound tough.

Susan giggles. "That's a pretty big ego for such a little guy." You're actually surprised by how friendly she's being, maybe being shrunk herself has helped her empathize with you? You're not really sure but you're grateful.

"Well, here we are." Susan announces taking you out of your trance. You look to see you're in front of the front door. Susan throws the door open to find...
1322112221112111122111.title: Tenative Team-up

choices: Before you get an answer Katie finally makes her appareance.
13221122211121111221112.content:
The door to the dollhouse is thrown open and the sight surprises you and Susan. You're not staring at a bedroom of epic proportions like you were expecting to, you were looking at a small city that seems perfectly scaled to Susan's size. Well ok calling it a city is an overstatement, it's only a few rows of houses but still. Even more pressing than that was what was in the middle of the "town". Towering over the rest of the city is a giant Barbie doll, jesus she must be as tall as the statue of liberty. Susan continues to stand in the door way, overwhelmed at what she's looking at. You look out further and see shapes that vaguely look like household objects, they're way to big and way to far away for you to see clearly though. You look down, trying to find out where you are and see that Susan's standing on a smooth wooden surface. Which doesn't really narrow down your options.

Susan finally starts to move, seemingly towards one of the other houses. Come to think of it you don't see anyone else here, Katie's surely shrunk other people by now so where are they? Could they just be hiding in the houses? Susan walks up to the front door of the nearest house, it looks identical to the dollhouse you and Susan woke up in. In fact they all look identical. Susan knocks on the door, not sure what to expect.

What happens next?
13221122211121111221112.title: An entire shrunken city?!

13221122211121111221113.content:
Susan throws the door open and you and Susan find something we didn't expect, a huge red plastic tube. Easily big enough for Susan to walk through without ducking. It seemed to be a bit transparent, just clear enough for light to seep in but not clear enough to see anything clearly under our feet. You turn around and look past the towering dollhouse see that you're in a dome of some kind. Honestly it kind of reminds you of playing in the Mcdonald's Play Place maze thing when you were a kid. Who knows, she might of shrunk one down.

"Susan, turn around and look at this." you say.

"What is it?" Susan asks while whipping her head around, sending you sprawling into the side of the cage. Susan looks at the wall for a second before turning back around, which sends you sliding again. "I think I might know where we are." Susan announces.

"Mind filling me in?" you ask.

"Back when me and Katie first went to this college she used to have a pet hamster. Her favorite thing about it was making those little mazes for him." Susan explains.

"So you think we're in one of her mazes now?" you ask.

"Exactly." she clarifies.

'Well that's just great.' You think to yourself. "Well let's get going." Susan says as she takes her first step into the red tube. The light being filtered through the tube gave everything a red hue. We wandered further through the twists and turns of the tube maze. Eventually we reach a drop off.

"I think we have to jump down." Susan says.

"Correction: You have to jump down. I don't really have a say in the matter." You sigh.

"Hmm, guess you're right. You owe me, you haven't really been pulling your weight on this voyage." Susan quips. "I'm sure you'll find someway for me to pay you back later. As for now we have a hyper active Sorority member who has the power to turn the entire world into her play thing. So we should probably be focusing on that." She replies with an impatient tone in her voice.

Suddenly Susan's hands go up to your cage and begin to undo it from her ear.

"What are you doing?" You ask, a little bit scared.

"I think you've forgotten your place, I'm about to remind you." She says as she finishes getting the cage off her ear. She holds the cage by the top with the thumb and forefinger of her right hand. Her arm swings around and you're looking at her right in the face. She starts swing the cage back and forth like a pendulum, causing you to bounce from side to side. She keeps the momentum going but turns the cage a little bit, causing you to be facing her. The cage gets close to her face then swings back. This goes on for a bit. The cage swings towards her face again and when you get to the apex of your swing she winks at you. You don't have time to wonder why she did that because as soon as you begin to swing backwards she lets go. So much for her acting nicer.

You find yourself hit with pit in your stomach as you're launched off the drop off. The cage hits the ground with a clang. The cage hit the ground sideways and rolled a little ways after landing. Before you're even able to stand up, another thud hits your ears as the ground beneath you shakes. You're covered in a shadow and you find yourself staring at Susan's tennis shoes. The shadow gets darker as she bends over and you find yourself being whisked up again. Battered and bruised by the fall you just lay there as you rise back up Susan's face.

She grins as she looks at your broken form. "I'm in charge here, got that dust mite?"

"Yes." you choke out.

"Good." Susan says as she moves the cage and secures it back to her ear. She starts walking again as you recover. Eventually she reaches a fork in the road.

The left side has green pipe and the right side has purple pipe. You're not sure if the colors mean anything but Susan better choose carefully. Which way does she go?
13221122211121111221113.title: Fragile Alliance

13221122211121111222.content:
Eh, screw Susan. You can take care of this on your own. You head towards the bedroom door and shimmy underneath it. As you walk down the hall towards a giant staircase, you feel distant, titanic rumbles. It sounds like movement, but what you don't know. You shiver as you realize that was probably Katie moving around. You hop down the staircase, and arrive at the front door. Steeling yourself, you take a deep breath and slide under the door.

Brown. Every direction, all you can see is brown. A massive plain of brown, with a few massive, blurry objects nearby. More rumbles happen, and you watch as a monolithic, yellow pillar falls out of the sky. It rolls towards the dollhouse, before finally coming to a rest just at the step of the porch. You can see green writings on the side of the three hundred foot pillar: "..ONDEROGA". You nervously look to the right, and see that the pillar changes to a metal, then a massive pink dome. To your left, the pillar tapers into a black point.

A pencil. This is a pencil. You're on a table, most likely Katie's desk, and a pencil nearly crushed you. No, it nearly crushed a dollhouse, to which you yourself are doll-sized. You can't possible be bigger than 0.004 inches tall! That means Katie must be...20 miles tall! This is all to much for you to handle right now.

Unfortunately, you don't have much of a choice. A group of pink pillars larger than most skyscrapers descend from the heavens, towards the pencil. This might be the dumbest idea ever, but you think that climbing onto the mile-long writing utensil might be a good idea. When it gets lifted into the air, you might be able to see where the gun ended up. Then again, that will also put you right at the attention of Katie the giantess. Better make a decision quick, the fingers are getting closer...

You see the familiar metal device on her bed. As you plan your next move, the pencil turns vertical, throwing you off your perch and knocking you out.

You awake a split second later, on a massive white plain. The floor seems to be made of a jungle of fibers that stretch in every direction, and what is that whooshing sou-

BOOM

It appears Katie is writing down words, and you watch as the monstrous tool scrolls across the paper, only to return to the left side and repeat. 13221122211121111222121.content:

So I'm basing all my size comparisons on that size using as I said earlier the GTS converter 3.05. Like I said I doubt most people care but some of you guys on this site like consistency in these stories and I think these size comparisons are especially important at these sizes so that you can at least somewhat imagine them so I figured I'd tell you how I was getting these sizes. Now onto the chapter!)

"Huh, how'd you get all the way over here little guy?" Katie booms. Katie begins to reach down, those five digits, each of them as big as the Washington Monument bearing down on you. Suddenly she stops and her hand retreats.

"Guess I can't pick you up at this size huh?" Katie muses to herself. "Oh I know!" she exclaims and without warning she begins to bend over. The ground under your feet begins to go from horizontal to vertical. For a little bit you could keep holding onto the fabric but eventually your arms tired out and fell toward Katie's awaiting palm. Your back slams into the desert of her palm and you're starting to become convinced that the Size Gun not only made you puny but more durable as well.

Katie lifts her palm up to her face and for the umpteenth time you find yourself staring face to face with a giantess. You struggle to keep your balance as every time she breathes in you're almost sucked into her mouth or nose and every time she exhales you're threatened to be blown right off her palm. She begins to talk and the sound is too much for you, you fall to your knees and cover your ears. "I didn't notice that you were awake yet, I don't see Susan anywhere so she must still be sleeping. I set you guys on my paper while I did my homework so I wouldn't lose you!" she explains perkily.

If your head weren't still ringing you would've face palmed. Why would she think that a piece of paper she's writing on would be a safe place for someone barely a millimeter tall. Though you actually have to thank her stupidity since she seems to think homework is more important than using the terrible weapon she has at her disposal. With her so close you might be able to talk to her even at this size, and with how stupid she is you might be able to convince her to let you see the gun. You're still not sure what you could do with the gun at your size but you've come too far to give up now.

"Oh little guy you have no idea how many ideas I have about how to play with you! The bubbly sorority booms. No, you don't want to play whatever games she's thought of. She starts to curl her fingers around you, presumably to make sure you don't fall off while she carries you somewhere. It's now or never, you may never get so close to her face again, mostly because you might not survive whatever she has planned for you. You start to yell out to her. Does she hear you?

Well, where are you?

It looks like a slightly smaller version of an old Victorian mansion. You keep heading towards the house and your confidence begins to diminish as you get closer to the steps. With each second the first step begins to tower more and more over you. You skid to a stop as you reach the base of the step and crane your neck upwards. You sigh as you realize you'll have to start climbing. Luckily the house is old and the brick used for the steps are showing imperfections, perfect handholds for you to use. Oh god have you taken too long, what'll happen if she finds you?

You spin on your heel and you're staring at two tan pillars that rise up and up. You don't notice any imperfections but then again looking this high up is making your vision blurry.

A booming sound knocks you out of your trance. Your eyes race back down to ground level and you notice her raising her left foot to the first step. You notice that she's wearing sandals. Her foot slams onto the step and you can still feel the vibrations all the way from up here. You're not going to be able to completely avoid her, she's way too big. You dash towards her second and third toes, as your running her other sandal slams down beside you're on. The vibrations make you stumble but you keep on running. You dive into the space between her toes. Since you're so small it's not cramped like you would expect. You're hit with vertigo again as her foot raises up, The foot slams back down like last time and you're body is thrown off balance as you're bounced around between the two toes. It hurts a bit but it's better than being crushed or thrown off the sandal. Sound assaults your ears as the giantess turns the door knob and opens the door. She takes a few steps into the house and you're battered between the toes again. You're gonna be sore by the end of this but it's better than being dead.

Suddenly Kana stops in her tracks and stares down the hallway, "Kana what's up?" you ask noticing her weird behaviour, she simply points straight ahead.
"Those two, they make fun of me for accent." she states, turning around you see who she's talking about, there are two punks loitering around near the stairwell, just looking at them you can tell they're bad news.
"Don't worry, they wont bother us, we're just gonna walk past and be done with it." you say trying to reassure her, you need to pass them anyways because they're on the way to the stairs.
You start walking but Kana just stays put, you grab her hand and start trying to pull her along but seeing as she's slightly taller than you, she's barely budging, turning around you look her in the eyes.
"Don't worry I have a plan." you say flashing the ray gun from your pocket, a look of realization comes up on her face before she smiles and walks up next to you.

As you and Kana get closer to the punks they step out into the middle of the hall blocking both of you from the stairs.
"What's the problem here guys?" you ask a little irritated.
"Our problem is that dumb girl beside you, step aside you little runt." the taller on grunts.
"You got a problem with her you can take it up with me, I'm warning you." you say stepping infront of Kana.
"That's it, you're asking for it!" the shorter of the two states before walking towards you, turning around and checking the hallway to make sure it was clear you turn back and face the two punks, as quick as a cowboy you pull out the gun and zap both of the punks before putting it back into your pocket.
Engulphed in a green haze both of the punks rapidly shrink before stopping at one inch tall, you casually step forwards, scoop both of them up, walk back to Kana, and dump them into her hand.
"You two in big trouble now, but I deal with you later." she says before dumping them into her purse and walking with you with the biggest grin you've ever seen on her face.

After a few more minutes of walking and talking with Kana you've come to know her more, she's frok Tokyo and didn't have much time to study the language before she came here which explains her accent and why she always looks confused walking around the school, one week here and you've already made a new friend.
Stepping out of the front door you and Kana walk along the sidewalk a while before sitting down on a bench, Kana opens up her purse and begins to play with her two pets while you just tilt your head back and give a massive sigh of relief.
Pulling out the gun and looking it over again you wonder out loud, "What now?" you're exhausted and Kana probably is too so you both decide to head to her place because you're going to school from your family's house and being an exchange student Kana has her own apartment where you can experiment with the ray gun and decide what to do next.

After walking two blocks you reach a the small apartment complex that Kana lives in, you both walk inside and up to the second floor before opening Kana's door and entering, her apartment, it's about what you expected, white painted walls, livingroom/kitchen, bedroom, and a small bathroom.
There are some posters on the walls in japanese and a lot of plushies on one of her shelves, you both sit down in the livingroom and begin talking about the gun, eventually that gets boring and you just turn on the tv.
The sky is turning a deep blue outside so you decide to just stay the night at your new friend's house, you can talk with her about the ray and what to do with it in the morning when you're well rested.
You and Kana slowly doze off together on her livingroom floor under some blankets to some old japanese tv show dvd she had laughing about it until you're too tired too laugh let alone keep your eyes open.

She sank to the "floor" of her daughter's toenail, fighting back tears. Her husband was dead, and she would never be found.

"WELL, I'VE GOT NO USE FOR YOU," Kelly told her speck, unaware it could tell what she was saying. "Kelly please no help me!" the super tiny woman cried, but there was no way she could be heard, either. Kelly thought a bit about what to do, then murmurs, "I GUESS I SHOULD...
1541211212122.title: Nothing of Use

choices: Kelly's crotch (through a hole in her jeans)
15412112121221.content:
"WELL, GOOD BYE BUG!" Kelly echoes. Your poor, tiny mother can only watch as Kelly licks her finger. Kelly then places her wet, sticky finger against your tiny mom and lifts her up to her face.

Your mom watches as your sister's lips form into an "O". She screams as Kelly blows the spec sized woman off of her finger into the abyss.

Your mother flies through the air screaming, though she soon realizes that her lack of weight means she is almost gently floating towards the ground. Then a slight breeze causes her to change direction.

Your mom realizes that her spec sized body is about to land where?
15412112121221.title: ...LET YOU GO." (She abandons the bug.)

choices: Kelly the giantess now everyone seems tiny!!
15412112122.content:
There was a bright flash, temporarily blinding both Kelly and your minuscule mother. When their vision returned they realized that your mom was her normal size again.

This was quite awkward.
On top of that she’s pissed.


There’s a struggle for the gun then a flash.
15412112122.title: Her normal size again (awkward)

choices: Kelly secretly feeds her mother to you
You suddenly walk out of the back room
154121121221.content:
When the light faded your mother wanted to scream, in fact she did. She was once again a measly 1/2 inch tall staring at the enormous toes of her normal sized daughter. To say she was pissed would be an understatement, She. Was. furious!

Kelly on the other hand was shocked. She had no idea the "bug" she was about to torture was actually her own mother. As she stared down at the little speck attacking her big toe, a horrifying realization reared it's ugly head. The other bug she crushed must've actually been... her father!

Kelly felt ill, dizzy, horrified. Her father... your father... she squashed him like a bug under her foot. The very same foot her mother was furiously attacking. He was nothing more than red paste now!

"Oh god." she whispered, her eyes beginning to water.

What was she going to do now? She killed her own father, even if it was just a mistake. She didn't know. She was doomed. Her life was over. She'd be arrested, sent prison, she'd spend the rest of days eating three meals a day and sipping toilet wine!

No! No! No! She could fix this! She could get out of this! There were no actual witnesses, right? Her brother was passed out in the back with the door closed and her father was self explanatory, dead men told no tales. That just left her mother. What was she going to do with her?

Re-growing her was simply out of the question, she attacked her the last time. As a matter of fact she was still attacking her, just very unsuccessfully. Her miniscule punches were as threatening as an ant to a dinosaur. Flicking her big toe, she sent the shrunken woman flying onto her back.

Her mother was weak and helpless right now. She could work with that. Years of crime shows taught her one thing, bodies leave evidence and that's no good. Luckily for her she had a shrink ray. She stared down at the tiny woman intently as she wracked her brain.

She had to play this carefully.
154121121221.title: Kelly's Dilemma

1541212.content:
While your parents are watching TV together downstairs, you and your sister are each doing your own thing upstairs. While the size gun rests on the couch, you leave the room to go to the bathroom. Unbeknownst to you, Kelly walks past the living room and spies it on the couch.

"Well I'm sure he won't mind if I check it out," she thinks to herself. She proceeds to examine the fun in her hand pondering how you were able to create such a thing.

She is snapped back to reality however as you exit the bathroom. "Hey what's up," you say. Completely startled by you, Kelly accidentally fires off the gun. Both of you quickly look up to see it strike the mirror. To your amazement, the beam splits in two as it hits the mirror and ricochets back at each of you, reducing you each to one inch tall.

On the floor you and Kelly take in your surroundings. You begin looking for the gun only to realize that when Kelly panicked, she dropped it back on the chair, meaning it did not shrink with you. Before either of you could say anything though, you hear a consistent thudding.

You and Kelly crane your heads up to see what walking towards you?
1541212.title: Smaller perspective

info.brief_description: You acquire a size-changing gun, starting a wild journey~
info.description:
Wexler's size gun is back! Welcome back to the adventure!

Have fun with growing and shrinking people and objects! You acquire a size gun, and start having fun with it. Do you become an inch tall man, or a 4 story behemoth? Do you start growing or shrinking friends, or that mysterious sexy stranger? Anything goes except scat play. Anything else!

~One sentence chapters will be edited or deleted. Please add something with substance and imagination to further the adventure.

Beyond that have fun and take it ANYWHERE you want! And thank you in advance for any additions!
info.pretty_title: Ample Adventures with a Size Gun
